skill.name: preset
skill.description: Intelligently deploys Azure OpenAI models to optimal regions by analyzing capacity across all available regions. Automatically checks current region first and shows alternatives if needed. USE FOR: quick deployment, optimal region, best region, automatic region selection, fast setup, multi-region capacity check, high availability deployment, deploy to best location. DO NOT USE FOR: custom SKU selection (use customize), specific version selection (use customize), custom capacity configuration (use customize), PTU deployments (use customize).
skill.summary: Intelligently deploys Azure OpenAI models to optimal regions by analyzing capacity across all availa...
skill.author: microsoft

security_audit.summary: All 224 static findings are false positives. External commands (192) are markdown documentation showing az CLI command syntax. Filesystem (25) are markdown relative links and ARM resource ID format examples. Network (5) are documentation URLs. This is legitimate Microsoft Azure AI Foundry deployment documentation with no executable code, no malicious intent, and no user data exfiltration.

content.user_title: Deploy Azure OpenAI to Best Region
content.value_statement: This skill automatically finds the best Azure region with available OpenAI capacity and deploys your model in minutes. It checks current region first, then searches all regions if needed.
actual_capabilities: Check OpenAI capacity in current Azure region first
Query all Azure regions if no local capacity available
Deploy models with automatic capacity calculation
Create new AI Foundry projects when needed
Handle deployment name conflicts with auto-generated suffixes
limitations: Requires Azure CLI and active subscription
Does not support PTU or dedicated capacity deployments
User must provide project resource ID interactively

use_cases.title: Quick OpenAI Deployment
use_cases.description: Deploy gpt-4o or gpt-4o-mini to your Azure AI Foundry project in the fastest available region with one command.
use_cases.target_user: Developers needing fast AI model access

use_cases.title: Capacity-Aware Multi-Region Deploy
use_cases.description: When your primary region has no capacity, automatically find and deploy to an available region.
use_cases.target_user: Enterprise users with high availability needs

use_cases.title: New Project Setup
use_cases.description: First-time users can deploy models with automatic project and resource group creation.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Deployment
prompt_templates.prompt: Deploy gpt-4o to my Azure AI Foundry project using the preset skill. My project resource ID is /subscriptions/{sub-id}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts/{account}/projects/{project}.

prompt_templates.title: Deploy with Region Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check which Azure regions have available gpt-4-turbo capacity and deploy to the best one using the preset skill.

prompt_templates.title: Deploy New Model Version
prompt_templates.prompt: Deploy the latest version of gpt-4o to my project. Use preset to find optimal region with capacity.

prompt_templates.title: High Capacity Deployment
prompt_templates.prompt: Deploy gpt-4o-mini with 150K TPM capacity to the region with most available quota using preset.

output_examples.output: Checking capacity in East US... Capacity found (100K TPM available). Creating deployment 'gpt4o-prod-8a2f' with GlobalStandard SKU... Deployment successful in 45 seconds.

output_examples.input: Deploy gpt-4-turbo but East US has no capacity
output_examples.output: East US: 0 capacity. Querying all regions... East US 2: 120K available, Sweden Central: 80K available. Select region: East US 2. Creating deployment... Done.

best_practices: Set PROJECT_RESOURCE_ID environment variable to skip interactive prompts
Use default 50% capacity allocation to leave headroom for scaling
Defer to quota skill for quota increase requests when all regions are full
anti_patterns: Do not use for PTU or dedicated capacity deployments (use customize skill)
Do not hardcode specific region when capacity is the priority
Do not skip capacity check by specifying explicit SKU

faq.question: What models can I deploy with preset?
faq.answer: Preset supports all Azure OpenAI models including gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4-turbo, and llama models. It fetches the model list dynamically from your account.

faq.question: How does preset choose the optimal region?
faq.answer: It first checks your project region for capacity. If none available, it queries all Azure regions and presents available options sorted by capacity.

faq.question: What happens if no region has capacity?
faq.answer: The skill provides actionable guidance: request quota increase via the quota skill, list existing deployments, or try alternative models.

faq.question: Does preset support custom SKUs?
faq.answer: No. Preset uses GlobalStandard SKU only. For custom SKU or PTU deployments, use the customize skill.

faq.question: How is deployment capacity calculated?
faq.answer: Preset calculates 50% of available capacity with a minimum of 50 TPM (tokens per minute) to ensure headroom.

faq.question: Can preset create new projects?
faq.answer: Yes. If no project exists in the selected region, preset can create a new AI Services hub and project automatically.
